bow: did any of the mothers here not want children before certain age before they got pregnant wondering about the experiences of mothers who did want kids before getting pregnant as compared to those who have always wanted to become moms went through everything originally wanted to have kids at 21 then grew up up and said screw that later decided did want any and for few years that was the case even after got married we both agreed eventually though we started to want family and started trying get pregnant especially because always said wanted no kids after 35 after about years we were told our chances of bringing child into this world were practically nil if we did use ivf or some treatment this time said screw that as well had seen friend go through treatments and decided would prefer to be childless than feel like shit have so many possible complications maybe lose the child then theres the cost of it all with or without complications so life kept going after years married we decided to buy house nice decently stylish we said fuck it it not like we re having kids one day before we signed on the house bam go have some blood tests taken aften some weird bleeding obviously was now pregnant so ended up having our girl at 34 after all and am considering raising that 35 year mark to have another so my baby can know the agony of having sibling lol *sigh* yeah and not proud of it never hated kids and knew that would want kids later in my life but was ready yet it was difficult for me was quite done with my degree my husband had just gotten accepted to medical school and just did feel ready really did have much time to prepare myself for baby either found out that was pregnant three days after my husband acceptance to medical school within those nine months had an 18 credit semester my husband graduation the death of two family members move halfway across the country and terrible storm where we lost power and potable water the week before my baby was born felt so bad because even when first held him in my arms did feel the connection that had heard about it was until couple weeks after he was born where felt content was happy yet but had finally felt that deep unexplainable love for my son he had just eaten and had fallen asleep on my chest and felt like my heart was going to explode so yes even though wish that would ve gotten pregnant later maybe after medical school would trade it for anything all ever wanted was to be mommy when other girls talked about becoming singers and actresses just wanted to have family was weird my husband and were married at 19 and had no plans of rushing into having children but knew we wanted to eventually three years later our son came along he was unexpected but by no means unwanted year after that we decided it was as good time as any to try to expand our family but ended up having trouble it took us year and the help of clomid but we re now expecting number two do know if we ll have any more due to some complications but so happy to have the family ve always wanted know you re asking for moms who did want kids but thought provide glimpse of the complete opposite for comparison it is completely normal to not want kids though have friend who adamantly declared that she never wanted kids but is now completely in love with motherhood with two small kids hated kids and up until about 27 was never ever gon na have one now have two year old and one on the way wtf happened haha but love being mother so much and really wanted to be mom before my first was conceived so somewhere between 27 and 31 changed completely eta still not keen on kids in general do really like them on whole which is why try to avoid places on the weekends love my kid and my those of my friends but en masse nu uh you do have to be 100 completely omg love all kids and everything about them to be good mother did plan on kids or marriage met guy that just so happened to be my soul mate we eloped as still had no desire for big wedding have huuuuge catholic family and after sitting through wedding after wedding bleh fast forward nine years find out pregnant think to myself sure it wo be so bad now can not imagine my life without my little guy really did want to have kids at the age got pregnant but it was mostly because was immature working minimum wage job and was married was worried about not being able to provide but ended up marrying my then boyfriend when was five months along something was also kind of worried about we only been dating for about or months and most of our relationship spent pregnant however everything worked out better than expected we ve been together about eight years an have one other child as well now did really want kids until after 25 but when was 22 my gyn onc said if you were my sister tell you to have baby so the next year concieved my daughter in october 2009 we wanted to concieve january 2010 nevermind and since she been here life has been that much more awesome so glad we did wait and now we have our beautiful son and are planning to start trying for third and 99 final in august 2013 was never fan of kids and after being diagnosed with pcos never expected it to happen had tarot card reading years ago and was informed that after our third anniversary something would happen with regards to children and just blew it off since it was tarot reading and hey was able to have kids got pregnant on our third anniversary that was four years ago and now have daughter and son and ca imagine my life without them admit that was very immature in my teens and early twenties glad my first was born to me at 28 when was more mature and much more financially stable having child changed my life for the better as now no longer do drugs exercise and eat better my body image and self worth has improved greatly felt like kid till was 25 haha went back and forth and embarrassed to admit it depended largely on the attitude of the guy was with high school no kids college boyfriend had awesome nephews wanted kids wanted kids we broke up next couple of boyfriends were anti kid no kids met fiance he loves kids and definitely wanted several we got engaged and as was warming up to the idea of kids got pregnant probably would ve aborted if it had been for his excitement at having kids and his assurances that be good mom have days where think he so so very wrong but trying to just roll with it ll answer first on behalf of non redditor friend who is 100 what you re looking for she did not want kids absolutely hated them and her husband did want kids either they were married young at 19 and ten years later her boss denied her leave for doctor appointment the appointment would have been to renew her birth control prescription in any case between then and when the prescription was renewed and filled she became pregnant so yeah she was on the pill for at least part of her pregnancy they decided to keep the child and watched her morph from hate kids to hate kids that are mine to total momma bear her son is three now and she loves him to pieces as for the parents they re considering having another never wanted kids as child played with animals as teen avoided babies as often as could rarely touched my roommate daughter after she was born had list in my head of reasons not to have babies when found out was pregnant actually had backup plan just in case did feel anything for my baby of course then had her and love her more than anything figures still ca stand other people kids though my so had tarot card reading that said was pregnant three pregnancy tests and clinic later was he got the reading in december had her in may found out was pregnant in november and had her in april going from not liking kids and never planning on having them to having our own in months was quite the shocker will say did bond immediately with my daughter because was still in shock over everything had pre and after 24 hours of induced labor on mag had section under general anesthesia it took me several weeks to warm up to the idea had child my son had section under general anesthesia again but the entire situation with him could have been more different could agree more generally dislike everyone else children and can only tolerate them in small doses there are exceptions but generally try to avoid them if can remember sitting in bar in hong kong smoking chinese cigarettes and knocking back dirty martinis wearing foxy dress and grey patent stilettos remember the topic of conversation kids or no was emphatic no never not part of the plan fast forward three weeks book an appointment to see the doctor as ca shake the jet lag worried picked something up realised my ridiculously irregular period still had shown up so knew they would ask so peed on stick before heading to work turns out was weeks pregnant fast forward four years my daughter is watching spiderman and my month old is asleep in my arms it took great deal to accept the pregnancy and becoming mother now sahp and love it even consider third or even fourth 28 year old me would be horrified as stupid teen did when my sister got pregnant and as got older realized the potential hardships was at wreckless point and experimenting with drinking and few drugs around 23 met guy we slept together for months and woke up out of dead sleep and thought pregnant and need to have an abortion had no idea that in weeks would test positive and at that point could deal with the mental ramifications of abortion considered adoption and debated the first three months if could do be mom years later and she been the motivation for me to get off of my ass and do something with my life never want to be pregnant again but the idea of larger family appeals to me be happy with step child of some sort and love babies now like never did before completely agree love my children struggle with other people ca stand it when another mother asks me to take their child to the toilet really do want to be wiping another childs bum refusal often offends how old is your baby babies are hard was so much happier once could have conversation with daughter never wanted kids until married my husband it was just about being married either was engaged to guy few years before got together with my husband and we broke up because he wanted kids and wanted zero kids once my husband and got together we were sure if we wanted kids at all once we were more settled we made the decision to have kids we now have son and love being mom being mom is awesome but it has never completely dfined who am until got pregnant with my little girly did ever want to have kids had already had very heavy hand in raising my little brother had been live in nanny for kids have spent most of my life taking care of my parents because they are of ill health was perfectly content not having child at all then found out was pregnant for certain it was like happy little flame of joy came on inside me which is why insisted on her middle name being luminary love her more than thought could love another person and would give her up for anything what why on earth would people ask you to take their child to the toilet that just weird unless you re teacher to pre school aged children or something was going to have kids decided with the career wanted to do was even going to bother wanted no family no strings attached so could do whatever it was that would please me in my field lo and behold got pregnant and that quickly changed switched my major from astrophysics to secondary education in physics so could be with my daughter more often could have been more in love with something previously had not wanted had wonderful support system and wonderful lover and could ask for better pretty much just stop trying to be hardass on most things just when things get nice and comfy god came up and was like lol no and ruined everything planned for haha lots of the mothers we know now have more than one child if there is big group and my child asks to go to the toilet you can guarantee another child will want to go to often the response from the other parent is you go take my kid and ll watch your baby this really is that weird request but it makes me uncomfortable every time also hate anyone taking my daughter to the toilet so it could just be my problem have seen other parents who will quite happily let expect total stranger to escort their child into the bathroom think the attitude is that because that woman has children it fine you re lot nicer than am for sure lol was the oldest of kids and was 10 12 and 14 when my mom had her last so was helping with them majority of the time never ever wanted kids after that had enough with babies only have one oops and it ll stay that way my husband wants more but ca do it generally dislike kids unless they re related to me and now that mine is almost ve gotten past the bullshit stage and into the more interactive stage which prefer did really want kids until met my husband always had the feeling of wanting family but could imagine the whole process after years of marriage it was all could think about year later we have an awesome month old for me having grown up very poor the most important thing to me was achieving financial stability before having kids luckily we reached that goal through hard work and wise saving spending by the time was 29 doubt my husband and would ve had any kids if our careers had panned out or if we had financial catastrophe of some sort so no not an age just the ability to easily afford our spawn are you glad that you had baby after all that so interesting to hear thank you for your response that sounds like such rough time sorry you had to go through it but it great that you would trade it for anything thank you that such an interesting perspective that do really understand at all yet that such huge change in perspective hard to fathom really glad you love being mom it so great that it does completely define you definitely healthy imo why did your gyn tell you to have baby so early does that advice usually come later like near 30 your baby has ridiculously awesome name clearly you are doing something right did want kids at 27 by 31 we are trying for our second got pregnant on purpose with my daughter and am so in love with her and being mom month before my 30th birthday my gyno asked what are you waiting for when said did have kids yet had been seeing my bf at the time for week wtf she like you re not getting any younger thanks had my girl earlier this year at 33 and everything was fine it completely normal to bond with your baby gradually the magic moment of connection at birth does happen for everyone or even majority of moms never wanted kids pretty much hated kids until my niece was born and then hated all kids but her did even want to get married it was until met my now husband that when the thought popped into my head that would consider having babies with him that knew marry him post wedding we still wanted kids but not for while recall swearing up and down that we be waiting more years before baby the next week found out was pregnant we now have two and things are pretty good never wanted babies or marriage as long as can remember dreamed of growing up becoming an architect and living on the east coast alone perhaps dog if was feeling lonely had siblings who were 12 years younger than me and think that contributed to this for awhile because was sick of being the babysitter honestly probably still would have kept that belief but one accidental teenage pregnancy later and was all aboard the baby marriage train he was gynaecologist he was gynaecologist oncologist hence gyn onc had carcinoma in situ of the cervix at such high level ideally they have done hysterectomy however given my age and the fact had no children they decided against it but next time and he predicts in my case there will be next time that what they ll do it was gynaecologist australia do see random specialists for day to day things including vaginal health we see someone called general practioner or gp if you see specialist including paeditrition it means there problem saw gyn onc which is short for gynaecologist oncologist which is gynaecologist specialising in cancer we see ob gyns for babies and fertility and only once those are actually an issue for you ftr saw my gyn onc the afternoon got my positive pap back deleted think if we had had our first by accident wonder where we would be now do think we would be married and really do think we would have children am quite shocked when think how free and selfish was having my babies has turned everything in my life up to an 11 it louder messier and certainly poorer but so much better it was so hard adjusting to motherhood though the first weeks were nightmare seriously and then fell in love each day fall in love with them little more deleted never wanted children and really dislike children aside from my own once met my husband we both felt that it was just right to have child now we have year old son and he is amazing do want another kid nope was he planned nope was happy had him each and every day yes planned not to have children and was happy with that decision then had my daughter and am so happy did would want my life any other way best thing ever she 10 months on more than one occasion ve wondered how much longer until can actually reason with her ah that makes more sense thank you for the clarification ah shit thanks for reminding me to get my pap done had my baby one year and one fortnight after getting my all clear after cervical surgery but got ta keep on top of it glad all sounds to be working out for you it is february marks years clear do struggle with incomeptent cervix but other than that every thing is perfect feel like posted in my sleep or something cos this sounds like me oh except do have year old just little girl on the way yay hope my so and will make good parents that remains to be seen we do like strangers kids especially groups of them just the idea of kids birthday parties gives me headache one thing for sure though we certainly love our daughter and will do our best for her having child has warmed me to other children but greatly hardened me to shitty parents because now have personal proof that you do have to be selfish inconsiderate person to raise child my blood boils even more when see it know that the stresses of child are no excuse was always pretty certain would want child one day for the adventure and the experience of parenting however had significant fears it would never happen for me there some infertility in the family so put it on back burner absolutely did not want children in my twenties was travelling working overseas partying having wonderful life by my thirties several things changed bars etc are full of 20 something you grow out of that lifestyle travel is still brilliant but in your thirties you are often at stage that you can probably buy home get mortgage that does two things the expense restricts your travel and it gives you new project to focus on got really into gardening on my little balcony in my early thirties your childhood gets further away and you start to miss it and want to do it over the twenties thrill of adulthood and freedom has become customary and you start missing your earlier years maybe little rose coloured maybe not having child means you can pass on and relive lot of that fun people start dying in my case my mother bringing new life into the world is one way to not to replace them but to fill the gaps little the only way you get your wonderful family christmases back with now long dead grandparents and uncles and aunts etc is by becoming parents making your siblings aunts and uncles and your parents grandparents it about renewal because of the house and mortgage and the settling down with permanent partner things can get little static stale bit of rut having child is wonderful new project and experience that keeps your life really dynamic realise that sounds kind of weird to describe child as project but in many ways starting family is like that there is lot of planning lot of work and lot of change and you are creating and building something am so happy to read all of these all of my friends had kids really young or always wanted kids never wanted to deal with it and planned to live vicariously through my students as am teacher had work hours and could do anything in the world for months at time then one year went to brazil with my bestie something in the air changed had an epiphany on that trip told them could just feel it the world was going to topple over and flip inside out and upside down they all thought was crazy and losing my mind since couldnt explain what was going to happen just knew it would be huge three months later found out was pregnant life has never been the same never wanted kids in fact was pretty obnoxious about it like the child free folks until about 28 then was just ambivalent then around 34 reeeeaaally started to want baby finally had one at 37 now at 39 like another but do think we can afford two it bummer just had my baby in may am 21 and was not ready really was to sure about kids but it just kinda happened as it tends to my husband and got married when was just about 15 weeks no one knew but us it was very hard pregnancy and traumatic section delivery am currently having really hard time bonding with my daughter take care of her and would not just stop doing that because that is now my responsibility but feel like she just baby not specifically my baby think she little cuter then other babies see so know there is something there do care about her my husband has older kids and keep telling me it will get easier to relate once she can do more do feel like it was mistake to have kids this early it is hard to be parent when you do not feel fulfilled or rewarded by it it really makes me sad to feel that way and know it not her fault do blame her for how feel at all it very compacted feelings and hard to deal with do think it will be forever feeling though feel like just still waiting for that clicking moment where feel like mother like this is my child some people have told me it because was ready because did have some instinctual maternal want to be mother because of the pregnancy and delivery really am unsure of the reason think it just takes some mothers longer it takes dad while to build bond why ca that happen to mothers too it hard when people make me feel like there is something wrong with me because of my feelings it kinda makes me take steps back in the process it makes it hard to be honest and open about my feelings when feel like ll be marked by the beast and burned at the stake that more or less how my family makes me feel about it my husband has really been my rock and he has bonded with her so well he is so new at this though so that probably helps would be really lost and doing lot worse without him he is really helping me and encouraging me about this think even if women are feeling like do having someone there to help that is really good at it makes world of difference read all these books about how the mother is the life line of the child but my body hated pregncey failed me in the area of natural labor and refused to allow me connect with my daughter through breastfeeding wish had read book about how to bond with out those things but you never expect it to happen any other way was never in hurry to become mother growing up had two much younger brothers so had quite bit of experience with the day to day care of babies and knew how much work it would be through most of my twenties sort of assumed eventually do it but was with the right person plus was so busy and really enjoyed my life so much it was hard to imagine baby as entered my thirties actually started to come down more on the no children side of things had great life loved living on my own was deeply involved in things loved really was living exactly the life wanted for myself if you had asked me what wanted for myself when was younger was exactly there had found an amazing guy and though we talked little about kids it was always in the oh someday column not something was as serious about as should have been when found out was pregnant really did know how to take it was 33 and knew exactly how much be giving up considered going to planned parenthood cried lot was totally overwhelmed because knew would have to give up so much of what loved about my life if was going to be good parent fortunately am with an amazing amazing man who challenges me all the time to be better person and who has turned out to be great dad in the end decided after spending time with friend daughter that maybe just maybe could do this thing once made that decision still would say was ecstatic about it was very torn between feeling deep love and wonder at being pregnant and being depressed spent good deal of time being scared out of my wits he is ten months old now and he is magic love everything about him live and breath him he is amazing and guess after few bumps ve settled into being mother quite well wo lie it been hard to adapt to some things am very far away from people used to think were close friends and do hear much from them anymore feel lonely sometimes the day to day work is exhausting every day get home from work and start getting ready for the next because breastfeeding it hard for me to go get me time and do the things enjoy independently daddit is wonderful and is totally there for that but never fully away since have to lug the pump everywhere if go to get time for myself every once in while get in an actual funk because lot of what predicted when was newly pregnant has come true miss people miss my old lifestyle miss lot feel totally removed from my old life now kind of like it was some dream it simultaneously the hardest and most wonderful thing ve ever done sometimes love him so much feel like my chest is going to explode with the force of it ve never experienced this kind of emotion and connection with anybody ever before and that is something pretty amazing do think ever knew it was possible to feel this way why are some people that were in your life before not part of it now thank you for being so honest about your feelings and experiences hope you start to feel that bond soon most of them were people saw every day because we were involved in the same things when got close to having the baby moved in with my so well over an hour away so geographically far from everyone which is problem in itself plus none of them have kids and in fact it generally an anti baby group of people common for folks living that lifestyle so we do relate as well tried for while to keep up with things managed to make it to book clubs dinners or other events would go visit on weekends tried to text and email people to keep up but mothering has been exhausting too and it seems like if do do those things they do happen which has led me to feel little abandoned and lonely ve been surprised by who among that group who thought were all very close and love them all has actually bothered to do little things like the occasional text to see how doing admit being disappointed at who has think that as things slow down not tied to the pump as much and he is more independent etc we ll all be able to reconnect bit this last weekend was weird was out with friend had just seen couple weekends ago when saw her then we had great time but it was just me as baby was home with dad when saw her this weekend met up at an event with baby in tow it was totally different and we ended up hardly spending time together or maybe different when with him because so consumed by him and she ca relate to that dunno or maybe everyone just gets caught up in their own life time passes quickly and out of sight is out of mind whatever is driving it sad about it oh love you need hug your body is full of raging hormones you need time to settle
